alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains and La Garita Mountains Including Wolf Creek Pass and Creede (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 28 at 4:07AM MDT until May 28 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect for TODAY from 11 AM to 10 PM for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 222 through 224, and 226 through 237, which includes the Interstate-25 corridor eastward across the plains as well as Fremont County below 8000 feet, in addition to the Eastern San Juan Mountains, the La Garita Mountains, and the San Luis Valley... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued for TOMORROW from Noon to 8 PM for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 222...224... and 226 through 237...which includes all of the plains, Fremont county and the San Luis Valley... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 223... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 223. * Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be very favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains and La Garita Mountains Including Wolf Creek Pass and Creede
